content: Influenced by The Beatles, which British musician rose to fame in the 1970s with hits like "Your Song" and "Rocket Man"?

That would be Elton John. He's a legendary British singer-songwriter who has had an incredible career spanning several decades. "Your Song" and "Rocket Man" are just two of his many iconic hits. His collaboration with Bernie Taupin has produced some of the most memorable songs in popular music history.
